Faction.name: {=clan_baltic_2.name}Lietuva
Faction.text: {=clan_lithuania.text}This clan represents the Lithuanian principality. This clan is non-historical due to the lack of written sources. It was created for the reconstruction of the Baltic region. The clan coat of arms is a variation of the Baltic Jumis signs.

Faction.name: {=clan_lithuanian_2.name}Nalša
Faction.text: {=clan_lithuania.text}This clan represents the Žemaitian principality. This clan is non-historical due to the lack of written sources. It was created for the reconstruction of the Baltic region. The clan coat of arms is a variation of the Baltic Moon (Mēness) symbol.
